description: This file implements core functions for a Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) Object Proxy, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization routines for the SlapOpo (Object Proxy) object.

classes.name: SLAP_OBJ_PROXY_OBJECT
classes.description: Core object representing a SLAP Object Proxy, containing function pointers and handles related to the proxy's lifecycle and descriptors.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapOpoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Slap Object Proxy instance, setting function pointers and context handles.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOpoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys a Slap Object Proxy instance, freeing associated descriptors and removing the object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOpoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls all necessary subordinate objects required by the SLAP Object Proxy.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOpoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the SLAP Object Proxy object, setting its OID, function pointers, and member variables.
